column1:
At first I thought the book was very good..but then I realised it had many flaws. Moreover...many questions(especially the tough ones) do not have their detailed solutions at the end of the chapter. Also the book does not have a great theory altogether and the CD with the mock test also has a few glitches here and there. (There is no option to clear the selected answer..so if you make a selection but are not sure of the question...you don t have a choice to deselect it).
On another note...going by the level of questions given for each chapter...solving them can help you for other exams(some of them are previous year s IIT-JEE questions). And there is no stress on English and Logical Reasoning whatsoever.
Also some questions are incomplete and some are not given correct solutions. 
But a plus point of this book is that it has all BITSAT papers(2005-2013) so you can have a look at the level of the questions asked.
I WOULD SUGGEST THE BOOK BY DISHA EXPERTS...DON T MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE I MADE...BUYING THIS BOOK JUST BECAUSE IT S ARIHANT PUBLICATION BOOK IS JUST NOT GUARANTEE OF THIS BOOK BEING GOOD. 
PS: The book has some good questions so if you want to practice them...go for this one...but I would suggest Disha Experts 
PPS: Flipkart needs to check on the quality of the books stored in their retailer s warehouses...my book was a mess!!
column3: A good book but not a great one!

No other book can match the quality, quantity and standard of this book. 
 ---- Wiley has proven its brand of publications by issuing this amazing book for GATE aspirants from the authors from IISc. 
 ---- The book has the style of systematic and exhaustive coverage of all the topics in theory and practice problems in a magically balanced manner.
 ---- With simple and easy language, the book helps in finishing a great deal of study in a single stretch within minimum possible time. 
 ---- The list of important formulas are useful in quick revision of the topics. 
 ---- The book offers complete solutions of last 11 years questions with detailed discussion. 
 ---- The book is found free of errors, as it was major feature of other books. 
 ---- The book has strong theory as well as variety of questions to easily solve questions in GATE papers. 
* * * * * Candidates seriously preparing for high scores in GATE should not miss this amazing book. * * * * *

column1: The book covers the syllabus of GATE exhaustively and represents the subject in a systematic, integrated and easily perceptible manner. The book is devised with hierarchy and parallelism in the content which directly helps in preparation of GATE without unreasonable strains. Two introductory articles on methodological understandings and strategy for success in GATE are useful for achieving success in GATE. The content is highly descriptive in theories, derivations, and interpretations, which offers a rich understanding and firm grasp of the basic principles of the subject. A summary of important formulas is also in every chapter that provides a quick review. The book contains around 3000 MCQ\xe2\x80\x99s for practice and confidence building. Every chapter of the book contains rightly answered and explicitly explained questions in Solved Examples, GATE (2002-13), MCQ\xe2\x80\x99s, and NAQ\xe2\x80\x99s. The explanations are based on the presented theoretical content. The practice integrated with the available theory is helpful in preparation for GATE.

Vast Exposure to elementary algebra. 
Covers all requirements of ISI/CMI algebra section. 
Highly recommended.

The book provides great coverage on algebra and is good for examinations like JEE and SAT Subject Test. 
Pre-requisites: It is of no use to read grammar books when you don t know alphabets. In the same way, you need to know some basic algebra before starting up with this. For this you can buy: Elementary Algebra For Schools by the same authors. 
PROS: Results are arranged in point wise manner which makes this book easy to understand. Also, lots of examples are solved to give detailed content information. A large number of contents are covered making this one of the best coverage books. 
CONS: As I said, it has some pre-requisites. Then, the book has a generalized format and all topics are inter linked making it hard to divide them into class 11 and class 12 material. 
IIT-JEE point of view: It is a must buy book for any IIT Aspirant. The types of problems are very similar to real JEE questions. 
The book has 400+ pages and every page is full of information. Looking at PROS and CONS, I give it a rating of 4. 
Thanks
